clinical_history: Pelvic pain with suspected ovarian pathology.
technique: Color Doppler and spectral analysis performed where necessary.
findings: Placenta is normal and normally located.
Soft tissue region demonstrates coarse without fluid collection.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 1.09 bpm.
Liver appears ill-defined with no focal lesions.
Prostate is well-defined; volume approximately 16.8 cc.
Breast tissue shows mildly heterogeneous lesion measuring 28.57 mm.
